ygData.subject: Re: Off Topic
ygData.msgSnippet: Hello all, concerning my fire elemental. After a recent summoning, I saw something on the elemental s body I haven t noticed to now.  I keep remembering my
ygData.messageBody:
Hello all, concerning my fire elemental.

After a recent summoning, I saw something on the elemental's body I
haven't noticed to now. I keep remembering my elemental always having a
pure white spot in the center. Now there is a sort of Up-down arrow in
the middle of the spot. Does anybody know what this means?

Kapolokok

*********************************************************************
"Rumpletweezer ran the Dinky Tinky shop in the foot of the
Magic oak tree by the wobbly dum dum tree in the shade of
the magic glade down in Dingly Dell. Here he sold contraceptives..."
-- Python
